project.title: Stock Optimization
project.description: Combining my interests in data science and finance to produce a comprehensive report on Modern Portfolio Theory.

project.title: Volleyball Camps
project.description: To continue my love for the sport, I organized  volleyball camps, managed coaches, recruited participants and ran camps.

project.title: Comida Andes
project.description: During my semester in Peru, fundraised and kickstarted local chef Johan's online presence.

project.title: Univise
project.description: Transforming the academic advising industry with a free, 24/7-access LLM-powered chatbot tool.

project.title: Aerial Photography
project.description: During my 2020 year in Denver, I enjoyed capturing shots of developing suburbs and construction sites using drones and cessna aircraft.
